DOC.brief_title: Early Diagnosis Oral Cancer Detecting p16 Methylation
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Oral epithelial dysplasia ( OED ) one common precancerous lesion among Chinese adult . To investigate clinical predictive value p16 methylation diagnostic reagent early diagnosis oral cancer , investigator carry prospective multi-center double-blind cohort study . Methods:180 patient histologically confirm mild moderate OED include present study . The investigator use p16 methylation diagnostic reagent analysis p16 methylation status patient . Building two follow-up queue p16-methylated p16-unmethylated . The Statistical analysis use SAS6.12 software . All P-values two-sided . P < 0.05 consider test statistical significance difference .
